name: Vasa - Never Have Dreams
description:
Vasa release their debut EP 'Never Have Dreams' taking influence from a wide range of bands from Post Rock heavyweights Explosions in the Sky and Mogwai, to more technical and math influenced music such as Foals and Battles. 

“EP of 2012”
Glasgow PodcART

"Creators of some seriously sublime post-rock"
GoldFlakePaint

Tracklist:

1. An Exercise In Unhappiness
2. Cynthia
3. Empty Orchestra
4. Salamanders
5. Not Now, But Soon

For Fans Of:

This Will Destroy You, Maybeshewill, And So I Watch You From Afar

Catalog:

OLR011

name: Salò - Procne
description:
Salò return with their second EP 'Procne'. After a summer of live shows and festivals the band have built upon their visceral live reputation and the critical success of their debut self-titled EP.

“Salò are the complete package. They are exhilarating, intelligent and channel their influences exceptionally well. ”
Halina Rifai – Glasgow PodcART

Tracklist:

1.Fidelio 00:51
2.You've Been Here Before 03:09
3.I've Found Your Eyes 03:08
4.Three Beggars 01:46
5.This Is The Girl 00:28	
6.In The Sea Of Teeth 05:17
7.Malastrana 02:40
8.Plateau Of Leng 01:27
9.Gabriel Fades 04:13 

For Fans Of:

Drive Like Jehu, Fugazi, Jesus Lizard

Catalog:

OLR008

name: Bellow Below - Hooks
description:
Melding together cascading tapping guitar riffs, jazz influenced sporadic drumming and a flair for unconventional song structures Bellow Below have carved out a refreshingly unique sound for themselves. Everything about ‘Hooks’ feels well thought out and executed, from the shimmering guitar effects to the engaging lyrics. It is clear that a lot of love and effort has gone into this music and it is perhaps the transparency of this fact that makes the music such a joy to listen to.

Tracklist:

1. Elephant Island
2. Southern Opal
3. Prins Olav
4. Sanny Ball
5. Simbrah The Killah
Catalog:

OLR007 | Released: 10th October 2012

name: Crusades - Golden Throats
description:
After a headline set at this year's T in the Park t-break stage we bring you the debut EP from Crusades. 5 tracks of angular energetic rock from Glasgow's favourite post-hardcore sons. 


"Fast, loud, brash and brilliant, check out five great tracks from a top new band!”  9/10 - Rock Sound

"A brilliantly accomplished first record – Crusades certainly are righteous." - Musical Mathematics

“Crusades are like ‘At The Drive-In’ except more hardcore”
Ally McCrae – BBC Introducing Scotland

Tracklist:

1. Pseudo Andro
2. Hipster Surgery
3. Herlequin
4. I Heard They Cured Cancer
5. Landlocked Abysmal

Catalog:

OLR006 | Released: 10th September 2012

name: Overlook Records: Redrum Vol. 1
description:
Our first ever edition of redrum features all of our bands 

Tracklistings is:
1. The Darien Venture - 1.21 Gigawatts
2. Trapped in Kansas - SKin & Bone
3. Salò - VALIS
4. Bellow Below - Sourthern Opel
5. So Many Animal Calls - In Winter, We Should Have Headed For Shelter
6. Vasa - Empty Orchestra
7. Crusades - Harlequin

name: So Many Animal Calls - Traps (Single)
description:
PLEASE NOTE, ALL PHYSICAL SINGLES HAVE SOLD OUT, ONLY DOWNLOADS CAN BE PURCHASED.

Info: The new single from Glasgow fail-poppers So Many Animal Calls, a loud and catchy, this highlights the captivating presence and the quality writing ability as the band have matured into a must see act. Tracklist: Traps The Best Way To Be Broken For Fans Of: Twin Atlantic, The Xcerts, Manchester Orchestra, Biffy Clyro Catalog: OLR004CD | Released: 14 February 2012

name: Salò - Salò
description: Info: All tracks recorded and mixed by Ross McGowan at Chime Studios Artwork: Nick Blinko Tracklist: 1. Hunger Artist 2. 2-3-74 3. Pickmans Model 4. Useless Marksman 5. Iphis Breathes / Black Contrail 6. VALIS (Bonus Track) For Fans Of: Drive Like Jehu, Fugazi, Jesus Lizard Catalog: OLR003CD | Released: 7th December 2011

name: Trapped in Kansas - How To Go
description: Info: The debut EP from Trapped in Kansas, 6 tracks of intricate math tinged indie. “The EP verges between exciting and prosperous” The 405 “gigantic, with time signature changes galore, massive sweeps and that trademark voice” Beardrock Tracklist: 1. The man does wear the mask 2. I was born 3. Stick to the roads 4. The mask does wear the man 5. Skin & Bone 6. Happiness is an allegory, sadness a story For Fans Of: Maps & Atlases, This Town Needs Guns, Manchester Orchestra, American Football Catalog: OLR002CD | Released: 3rd October 2011

name: The Darien Venture - Indications
description:
PLEASE NOTE, ALL PHYSICAL SINGLES HAVE SOLD OUT, ONLY DOWNLOADS CAN BE PURCHASED.

Info: 5 Tracks of crushingly catchy Math-Pop from Glasgow 4 piece The Darien Venture. Recorded at Gal’s Studio by Gal. Mixed by Gal and The Darien Venture. Mastered by Chris Tsangarides. Tracklist: 1. Heights 2. E_R_A 3. Aminals 4. The Whydah 5. I am the Mediator For Fans Of: Tubelord, Minus The Bear, Biffy Clyro Catalog: OLR001CD | Released: 11 April 2011
